projects.title: AI Chat
projects.description: A place where you can chat with free LLMs from Hugging Face, built with Next.js and Langchain

projects.title: KingKong
projects.description: A Chrome extension that provides advanced filtering options for youtube comments

projects.title: Skill Hub
projects.description: A freelance platform for freelancers to find jobs and clients to work for

projects.title: Splitwise Web3
projects.description: A decentralized expense sharing application built on Web3 technology. Allows users to split expenses and settle debts using blockchain technology for transparent and secure transactions.

projects.title: 3D Classroom Simulator
projects.description: An immersive 3D virtual classroom environment. Built with OpenGL and C++.

projects.title: Car Rental System
projects.description: A comprehensive car rental platform built. Includes features like booking management, vehicle tracking, and user authentication.

projects.title: NoteDrop
projects.description: A modern note-taking application with cloud synchronization. Features a clean interface, rich text editing, and real-time updates.

projects.title: Vartha
projects.description: A news aggregation platform that curates and presents news from various sources. Features categorized news feeds and personalized recommendations.

projects.title: HIVE Website
projects.description: A Reddit-like community discussion platform built using ejs. Features a modern design, post and comment system, and upvote/downvote functionality.

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: A modern implementation of the classic Tic Tac Toe game with a clean UI and multiplayer support.
